 1998-08291998-05-120,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of STINDAR K. LAL, of Oakville, Ontario, as Chairman of the Arbitration Board for a term of three years; and re-appointment of ALFRED ERNEST PALLISTER, of Calgary, Alberta, as Vice-Chairman of the Arbitration Board for a term of three years.
